source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Jewelry Making For Beginners: Beading Techniques & Stitches
items.headline: Learn how to make bead and wire jewelry, bead stringing jewelry and bead weaving jewelry
objectives_summary: Get to know different types of materials and tools( such as beads, findings, jewelry wire, pliers, stringing materials, beading needles, etc)
Learn to make earrings, necklaces and bracelets with beads, wire, frames, chains and jewelry findings.
Learn to make beaded bracelet with beading wire and gemstone beads.

items.title: Painting Portraits with Procreate
items.headline: Paint along recreating this portrait, and apply what you learn to other portraits.
objectives_summary: How to create a portrait
Gain confidence in your ability to use Procreate
Blending colors for smooth skin

items.title: Pencil Drawing - The Guide to Graphite
items.headline: A complete course for mastering drawing with graphite.
objectives_summary: Students will learn various pencil drawing techniques and approaches to drawing.
Students will learn the various grades to graphite and when each pencil should be used.
Students will learn graphite application techniques including hatching and cross hatching, blending, and rendering.

items.title: Complete Portrait And Figure Painting (step-by-step)
items.headline: Course covers the basics of figure and portrait painting using a limited palette.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will be able to paint a portrait or figure with a limited palette.
Students will also learn about color theory, color mixing, complementaary colors, simultaneous contrast, and all aspects of starting and finishing a painting.

items.title: Digital Collage Sheets Quick and Easy with Photoshop Kit

visible_instructors.title: Cat Whipple
visible_instructors.job_title: Photoshop expert teaching Photoshop to artists: 4 courses
visible_instructors.name: Cat

items.headline: Learn how to create digital collage sheets in Photoshop for crafts or to sell online. Ready made templates included.
objectives_summary: Understand what collage sheets are and how they are used
Create digital collage sheets
Use the collage sheet templates like a pro

items.title: Watercolor Painting - Introduction To Watercolor Painting

visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Rod

items.headline: Watercolor Painting For Beginners An Introduction Course to Learn Watercolor Painting Techniques instruction
objectives_summary: Understand Watercolor Painting Basics Like Values & Color Mixing
Learn The Basic Watercolor Painting Equipment
Know Your Watercolor Painting Colours & How To Mix Them

items.title: Resin and Alcohol Ink Art Basics: Make coasters and artworks
items.headline: Make fun and fascinating 3d art with the most amazing tiny details. Relaxing, creative and rewarding. Great for gifts.
objectives_summary: Learn how to create amazing 3d art pieces using resin and alcohol inks
Make coasters, small art pieces and graduate onto large and spectacular pieces with practice
Play with color, have fun and learn to use new materials

items.title: 3 Little Birds with Colored Pencils
items.headline: Learn how to draw three different birds with three different brands of colored pencils on three different surfaces.
objectives_summary: How to use three different brands and types of colored pencils
How to create colored pencil drawings on three different surfaces
How to use colored pencils to draw three different birds

items.title: Graffiti Formula - Complete Guide to Graffiti Sketching

visible_instructors.title: Brian Bee
visible_instructors.job_title: YouTube's top club dance teacher and art instructor
visible_instructors.name: Brian

items.headline: The complete beginner's guide to creating legit graffiti sketches
objectives_summary: Learn to create graffiti alphabet letters
Find out how to 3D
Get started with graffiti style coloring

items.title: Becoming Creative
items.headline: An Artistic Guide to Creativity
objectives_summary: You’ll learn what thoughts and habits stand in the way of being creative and learn how to move past them.
You’ll learn how to seek a deeper sense of meaning in everyday objects and experiences.
You’ll learn how to use divergent thinking in order to find creative solutions to problems.

items.title: Advanced Watercolor Cityscapes: Paint Your Own Urban Scenes

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Master the skills needed to create awesome watercolor street scenes.
objectives_summary: Learn valuable design skills for planning your artwork.
Gain knowledge of building artwork in layers.
Develop good focal points and center of interest.

items.title: Watercolor Painting Flowers by Award Winning Artist
items.headline: Flowers, Plants, Botanicals I 8 lessons I 3 Practice Sessions I 4 Activities I 1 Extra Special Lesson
objectives_summary: Learn to create volume and depth
Learn to describe dimension through subtle folds and wrinkles
Learn how to blend colors and create soft marks and exploding patterns

items.title: How to Draw 101: SHADING BASICS & Shadow Drawing Course
items.headline: Understand Light & Shadow Drawing Course - Create Depth, Realism, the Illusion of 3D on Your Sketches by Shading
objectives_summary: Make your drawings more believable to the viewer by shadows
Shading techniques to create the illusion of reality
How to add 3-dimensionality to your drawings

items.title: Beginners Acrylic Pouring FLUID ART Course

visible_instructors.title: Marie Ame
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified. IxCacao Facilitator & Master Crystal Healer
visible_instructors.name: Marie

items.headline: Everything a beginner needs to know about fluid art ⭐ ALL LEVELS ⭐
objectives_summary: The MUST in and outs of acrylic pour
The MUST materials to use when doing fluid art
DIY Budget friendly (multiple) pouring medium formulas

items.title: Serger 101: Machine Basics For Sewing with Serger
items.headline: Learning to use your serger with confidence
objectives_summary: All about the ins-and-outs of your serger – what it does, how it does it, and most importantly - how to thread your serger fearlessly.
Which stitches work best for a wide range of fabrics and designs – from delicate silk chiffons to stretchy spandex knits.
How to create professional looking seams, seam finishes, and hems around a variety of shapes, whether corners or curves.

items.title: Wheel-Thrown Pottery for Beginners
items.headline: Creating Wheel Thrown Ceramics
objectives_summary: Understanding of the technical processes, concepts and practices of pottery wheel based art.
Student will be able to throw basic forms on the pottery wheel.
